remarks:
Membership in a class builder restricted to a Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 20-Feb-2014.) 

---

 Membership in a class builder restricted to a cross product. (Contributed by NM, 20-Feb-2014.)
statement:
rabxp.1 $e |- ( x = <. y , z >. -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
rabxp $p |- { x e. ( A X. B ) | ph } = { <. y , z >. | ( y e. A /\ z e. B /\ ps ) } $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d ph y z $.
$d ps x $.
